caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man is in conversation with an older gentleman, and the man appears to hold a position of authority. The older gentleman seems scholarly and respectfully answers the man's questions. Then, in another room, the man is questioning another older gentleman who appears even older. This gentleman is also slowly responding to the man's inquiries. It appears the man is investigating something. As he carries a stack of books down a corridor, the man encounters a girl who seems to be a relative of his. They engage in conversation, and the girl proudly shares what she has learned with him. The man's expression appears very pleased, and the girl is quite happy. They seem to be living together, and the man affectionately kisses the girl on her forehead. Meanwhile, in another location, a distraught overweight individual is being comforted by another man.
